# SWOT UP: Modern Tech for Local Business

> Helping local businesses grow with modern websites, AI integration, and workflow automation.

## Core Services

- [Web & Mobile Development](https://swot-up.com/services) - Custom, fast, and mobile-first websites.
- [AI Integration](https://swot-up.com/services) - Chatbots, automated scheduling, and smart assistants.
- [Workflow Automation](https://swot-up.com/services) - Connecting tools like CRMs, calendars, and payment gateways.

## Industries Served

We provide specialized solutions for:
- [Restaurants](https://swot-up.com/industries/restaurants)
- [Clinics](https://swot-up.com/industries/clinics)
- [Home Services](https://swot-up.com/industries/home-services)
- [Auto Services](https://swot-up.com/industries/auto-services)
- [Salons](https://swot-up.com/industries/salons)
- [Fitness](https://swot-up.com/industries/fitness)
- [Retail](https://swot-up.com/industries/retail-stores)
- [Hotels](https://swot-up.com/industries/hotels)
- [Professional Services](https://swot-up.com/industries/professional-services)
